Description.Name: LRM Ammo
Description.Details: The Follow The Leader Warhead (FTL) was developed during the Star League era, this alternate munition for LRM launchers functions like a standard LRM flight in every way except one: When a target is hit, every missile in the flight will hit. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Has 50 shots.
